details.description:
335 Fenimore: Luxurious Living Near Prospect Park Stunning 3-Bedroom Apartment with Private Terrace! No Broker Fee!
Apartment Features: Air Conditioning Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Appliances Dishwasher Spacious Common Area Pet-Friendly Abundant Natural Light Track Lighting
Building Amenities: Gym Parking Laundry Room Roof Deck Media Room Bike Room
Prime Location: Just 2 blocks from the 2, 5, and Q trains Only 2 blocks from Prospect Park
Enjoy a perfect blend of luxury and convenience in this beautiful unit!

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
Welcome to your new home at 9509 Sutphin Blvd - Unit: 2! This spacious 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment is available now and ready to welcome you. Located conveniently close to the SUTPHIN BLVD - ARCHER AV - JFK AIRPORT subway stop, commuting is a breeze.
The unit boasts modern comforts, including a private roof where you can unwind and enjoy city views. Whether you're relaxing indoors or exploring the vibrant neighborhood, this pet-friendly apartment offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience.
Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this your new home sweet home! Contact us today for a viewing.

This 4-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom apartment in Ridgewood sounds fantastic! The high-end renovations and amenities like stainless steel appliances, central A/C, and updated bathrooms make it quite appealing. Plus, the proximity to multiple subway lines adds convenience for commuters. Offering assistance with finding roommates is a nice touch too?it can make the process much easier for potential renters. Overall, it seems like a great option for anyone looking for a spacious and modern living space in Queens.
Massive 4 bed/4 bath in prime location! Apartment features high end kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, laundry in unit, high ceilings and exposed brick. Pets ok! NO fee!

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

Do not miss out on this 3 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

3br/1.5 bth!
- Shared roof
-Laundry in building
-Stainless steel appliances, dishwasher in unit
-Amazing location in Flatbush super close to the 2/5 at Church Ave
-Hardwood floors
-Split units for heat and air conditioning
-Private Balcony
Email us to schedule a showing

amenities.other: A/C, Central A/C, Shared Outdoor Space, Roof Access, Balcony/Terrace

details.description:
Virtual tour available First and security only - no fee
Sun soaked 3BR 2BA available asap Prime Williamsburg location Walk to L train for quick commute Tons of cool places to eat drink and shop steps from home
Laundry in Building Pets OK
Now 1 Month free! Don''t miss out!

Perfect central Bushwick location surrounded by independent restaurants and coffee shops, neighborhood bars, bike shops, vintage shops, garden shops, supermarkets, liquor stores, and bodegas galore... and honestly anything else you can think of! Enjoy all the excitement of the neighborhood in the summer and stay warm in your cozy new home in the winter. Both will keep you happy and smiling without compromise! Conveniently located off the M train as well as the B38, B54, and B60 bus routes.
FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C; Heat Queen Sized Bedrooms Duplex with Basement BACKYARD ACCESS!!
Pet Friendly First; Security NO FEE!

amenities.other: Central A/C, Dishwasher, Duplex, Garden, Hardwood Floors, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description:
Great DEAL! GUT RENOVATED 3 BED in a beautiful Part of BROOKLYN?Just a few BLOCKS from the AMAZING GRAND ARMY PLAZA!
This is a Sun Filled Beautifully Renovated 3 bedroom apartment Located Near the 2,3; 5 Trains
About the apartment: Gorgeous WOOD floors Lots of windows ? great sunlight LARGE kitchen Granite Counters Beautiful bathroom ? fully tiled Very Well Kept Building!
The apartment is conveniently located near laundry, groceries, cafes, bars, and more?
Also just a few minute walk to some of the nicest and most cultured parts of Brooklyn. Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens?

Virtual tours available!
Act fast on this fantastic 2BR 1baths apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Flatbush-East Flatbush! Explore some of Brooklyn's best architecture with various styles of homes. Surrounded by a number of cool cafes, grocery stores, local restaurants, 2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Quick commute to Atlantic terminal with endless transportation options! Take a stroll to your near by Avenues like Flatbush Ave, Rogers Ave, and Nostrand Ave that are loaded with trendy, new small business and more!
- New renovation, just a few years old - 2 Flights up - All new appliances - Dishwasher - Shared roof deck - No fee - Available now - All utilities are separate

Some of BedStuy's absolute best restaurant, bar, and coffee choices are right here off Bedford-Nostrand! This lively neighborhood will cater to all of your needs and more. With Herbert Von King park just down the street, bodegas on every other corner where they'll know you by name, and beautiful brownstones lining the streets, you get to enjoy the true history and culture of BedStuy, Brooklyn. Not to mention FULL SIZE grocers to both your right and your left, reallyyy upping the NYC convenience level!
Conveniently located right off the G train as well as the B38, B43, B44, and B52 bus routes.
FEATURES: Washer/Dryer IN UNIT! Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Pet Friendly

amenities.other: Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer In Unit
